verses.verse: Now the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> against Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and fell <S%H5307><s%> slain <S%H2491><s%> on Mount <S%H2022><s%> Gilboa. <S%H1533><s%>

And the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> closely <S%H1692><s%> pursued <S%H1692><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> down <S%H5221><s%> Jonathan, <S%H3083><s%> Abinadab <S%H41><s%> and Malchi-shua, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Saul. <S%H7586><s%>

And the battle <S%H4421><s%> became <S%H3513><s%> heavy <S%H3513><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Saul, <S%H7586><s%> and the archers <S%H3384><s%> <S%H7198><s%> overtook <S%H4672><s%> him; and he was wounded <S%H9123><s%> by the archers. <S%H3384><s%>

Then Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his armor <S%H3627><s%> bearer, <S%H5375><s%> "Draw <S%H8025><s%> your sword <S%H2719><s%> and thrust <S%H1856><s%> me through <S%H1856><s%> with it, lest <S%H6435><s%> these <S%H428><s%> uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> come <S%H935><s%> and abuse <S%H9412><s%> me." But his armor <S%H3627><s%> bearer <S%H5375><s%> would <S%H14><s%> not, for he was greatly <S%H3966><s%> afraid. <S%H3372><s%> Therefore Saul <S%H7586><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> his sword <S%H2719><s%> and fell <S%H5307><s%> on it.

And when his armor <S%H3627><s%> bearer <S%H5375><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that Saul <S%H7586><s%> was dead, <S%H4191><s%> he likewise <S%H1571><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on his sword <S%H2719><s%> and died. <S%H4191><s%>
Thus Saul <S%H7586><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> with his three <S%H7969><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> [those] of his house <S%H1004><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> together. <S%H9191><s%>

When all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were in the valley <S%H6010><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that they had fled, <S%H5127><s%> and that Saul <S%H7586><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> were dead, <S%H4191><s%> they forsook <S%H5800><s%> their cities <S%H5892><s%> and fled; <S%H5127><s%> and the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and lived <S%H3427><s%> in them.

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about the next <S%H4283><s%> day, <S%H4283><s%> when the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to strip <S%H6584><s%> the slain, <S%H2491><s%> that they found <S%H4672><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> fallen <S%H5307><s%> on Mount <S%H2022><s%> Gilboa. <S%H1533><s%>

So they stripped <S%H6584><s%> him and took <S%H5375><s%> his head <S%H7218><s%> and his armor <S%H3627><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> [messengers] around <S%H5439><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> to carry <S%H1319><s%> the good news <S%H1319><s%> to their idols <S%H6091><s%> and to the people. <S%H5971><s%>

And they put <S%H7760><s%> his armor <S%H3627><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of their gods <S%H430><s%> and fastened <S%H8628><s%> his head <S%H1538><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Dagon. <S%H1712><s%>
When all <S%H3605><s%> Jabesh-gilead heard <S%H8085><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> to Saul, <S%H7586><s%>

all <S%H3605><s%> the valiant <S%H2428><s%> men <S%H376><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> and took <S%H5375><s%> away the body <S%H1480><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> and the bodies <S%H1480><s%> of his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> them to Jabesh <S%H3003><s%> and buried <S%H6912><s%> their bones <S%H6106><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the oak <S%H424><s%> in Jabesh, <S%H3003><s%> and fasted <S%H6684><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

So Saul <S%H7586><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> for his trespass <S%H4604><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he committed <S%H4603><s%> against the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> of the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he did not keep; <S%H8104><s%> and also <S%H1571><s%> because he asked <S%H7592><s%> counsel of a medium, <S%H178><s%> making <S%H1875><s%> inquiry <S%H1875><s%> [of it],

and did not inquire <S%H1875><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> Therefore He killed <S%H4191><s%> him, and turned <S%H5437><s%> the kingdom <S%H4410><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jesse. <S%H3448><s%>
